Program

Date & Venue

  • Date: April 25, 2020 (Saturday)
  • Time: 09:00 - 17:00
  • Venue: Hawai'i Convention Center, Honolulu, Hawai'i, USA

Schedule

  • 08:30 - 09:00 » Registration. Participants find their assigned tables. 

    Participants must ask for their assigned seats by approaching the SVs or any organizer.

  • 09:00 - 09:15 » Opening Remarks 

  • 09:15 - 09:45 » Ice Breaker

  • 10:30 - 10:45 » Coffee break & preparation for Poster Session 1 

  • 10:45 - 12:15 » Poster Session 1 

    • 10:45 - 11:30 » Group A

    • 11:30 - 12:15 » Group B

  • 12:15 - 13:30 » Lunch & preparation for Poster Session 2 

  • 13:30 - 15:00 » Poster Session 2 

    • 13:30 - 14:15 » Group C

    • 14:15 - 15:00 » Group D

  • 15:00 - 15:45 » Keynote #2:  Gierad Laput, Apple | Bio & Abstract

  • 15:45 - 16:00 » Coffee break & preparation for Poster Session 3 

  • 16:00 - 16:45 » Poster Session 3 

  • 16:45 - 17:00 » TBD 

  • 17:00 - 17:15 » Closing Remarks 

Showcasing Asian ingenuity in addressing local challenges in human-computer interaction research.
